wordageddon.service

Class ProgressIndicatorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordageddon.service.ProgressIndicatorManager

  • public class ProgressIndicatorManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for managing progress indicators and status messages during asynchronous operations.
    Since:
    2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gregorio Barberio, Francesco Peluso, Davide Quaranta, Ciro Ronca

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProgressIndicatorManager

        public ProgressIndicatorManager()

    • Method Detail

      • bindToService

        public static void bindToService(<any> service,
                                 ProgressIndicator progressIndicator,
                                 Label statusLabel)
        Binds a progress indicator and status label to a JavaFX Service. This automatically updates the UI components based on the service state.
        Parameters:
        service - the service to bind
        progressIndicator - the progress indicator to update (can be null)
        statusLabel - the status label to update (can be null)

      • showDuringExecution

        public static void showDuringExecution(<any> service,
                                       ProgressIndicator progressIndicator,
                                       Label statusLabel)
        Shows a progress indicator and status label for the duration of a service execution. Automatically hides them when the service completes.
        Parameters:
        service - the service to monitor
        progressIndicator - the progress indicator to show/hide
        statusLabel - the status label to show/hide

      • createProgressMessage

        public static java.lang.String createProgressMessage(java.lang.String operation,
                                                     int current,
                                                     int total)
        Creates a formatted status message for operations with progress.
        Parameters:
        operation - the operation name
        current - the current step
        total - the total steps
        Returns:
        formatted status message
